Package io.tweetninja.cli.Util

Class ConsoleTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tweetninja.cli.Util.ConsoleTable
  • public class ConsoleTable
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for generating ASCII tables on-the-fly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ConsoleTable.CellAlignment
      Describes the way text sits inside of a table cell.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsoleTable

        public ConsoleTable​(int width,
                    int height,
                    java.lang.String lineColor,
                    java.lang.String backgroundColor)
        Creates a new ConsoleTable, to be rendered at any time. Starts with all cells empty.
        Parameters:
        width - The width (in cells) of the new ConsoleTable. Cannot be changed later.
        height - The height (in cells) of the new ConsoleTable. Cannot be changed later.
        lineColor - The line (cell border) color of the new ConsoleTable. Can be changed later.
        backgroundColor - The background color of the new ConsoleTable. Can be changed later.

      • ConsoleTable

        public ConsoleTable​(int width,
                    int height,
                    java.lang.String lineColor)
        Creates a new ConsoleTable, to be rendered at any time. Starts with all cells empty.
        Parameters:
        width - The width (in cells) of the new ConsoleTable. Cannot be changed later.
        height - The height (in cells) of the new ConsoleTable. Cannot be changed later.
        lineColor - The line (cell border) color of the new ConsoleTable. Can be changed later.

      • ConsoleTable

        public ConsoleTable​(int width,
                    int height)
        Creates a new ConsoleTable, to be rendered at any time. Starts with all cells empty.
        Parameters:
        width - The width (in cells) of the new ConsoleTable. Cannot be changed later.
        height - The height (in cells) of the new ConsoleTable. Cannot be changed later.

    • Method Detail

      • setLineColor

        public void setLineColor​(java.lang.String lineColor)
        Changes the line color of the table.
        Parameters:
        lineColor - The new line color to use.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor​(java.lang.String backgroundColor)
        Changes the background color of the table.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - The new background color to use.

      • setCell

        public void setCell​(int x,
                    int y,
                    java.lang.String content)
        Sets the contents of a given cell.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the target cell (0-(width-1)).
        y - The y position of the target cell (0-(height-1)).
        content - The new contents of the cell.

      • setAllCells

        public void setAllCells​(java.lang.String content)
        Sets the contents of all cells.
        Parameters:
        content - The new contents of every cell.

      • setCellAlignment

        public void setCellAlignment​(int x,
                             int y,
                             ConsoleTable.CellAlignment alignment)
        Sets the text alignment of a cell.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the target cell (0-(width-1)).
        y - The y position of the target cell (0-(height-1)).
        alignment - The new text alignment of the target cell.

      • getCell

        public java.lang.String getCell​(int x,
                                int y)
        Gets the content of a cell.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the target cell (0-(width-1)).
        y - The y position of the target cell (0-(height-1)).
        Returns:
        The content of the cell.

      • render

        public java.lang.String render()
        Render the table to a string.
        Returns:
        A string that contains the rendered table.

      • render

        public void render​(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Renders the table directly to an out stream. Call render(System.out) to write to the console.
        Parameters:
        out - The stream for the table to print to.
